sections.title: Character Archetypes
sections.description: There is now a documentation page describing each of the 10 adventuring archetypes (at least flavor-wise). Soon the level up system will be available, as will example abilities for purchase and maybe rules for homebrewing your own! Boy howdy am I going to be fine-tuning these balancing equations for a while.

sections.title: Merry Critmas to you from the world of Umbrea!
sections.description: Much more soon to come! I will be trying to spend at least an hour a day on this project now that I've graduated and have some free time :D
